hero.title: Web Developer

about.description: Hi! I‚Äôm Tayfun ‚ÄúTai‚Äù Savas Boas AYA ‚Äì a web developer and digital strategist. I call Lake Constance (Bodensee) and beautiful Switzerland home. With my small family, I explore the world. I work flexibly ‚Äì whether remotely or at my Razor-Point √† la Tony Stark.
about.description-core: Passionate about IT, AI and marketing, I craft visually captivating websites, SaaS products and apps that delight, convert and scale sustainably.

benefit.flexibility: I am very flexible at work. Whether in a modern working environment on site or remotely - I adapt to your needs.
benefit.openminded: For me, programming and marketing are more than technical disciplines ‚Äì they‚Äôre creative problem-solving and digital art.
benefit.excellence: Premium-Quality over quantity ‚Äì I place great value on effective communication and smooth onboarding processes.

developer.description: On my journey, I‚Äôve applied modern frontend technologies and innovative concepts across diverse projects.
developer.description-core: I remain curious and open to new methods, constantly expanding my superpowers in web development.
developer.sub-description: Feel free to reach out ‚Äì I‚Äôm here to support you from the very first idea to the final product, always with transparency, efficiency, and genuine passion.

reviews.sectionTitle: What my colleagues say about me

marc.name: Marc Braun
marc.text: Working with Ty was extremely productive, inspiring, and tremendously enriching. The chemistry within our team was excellent, and this was clearly reflected in the quality of our projects. Tayfun has a bright future ahead. His boundless motivation and captivating commitment greatly contributed to the positive atmosphere in the team. One can feel his positive aura and the passion he ignites.

linda.name: Linda Meier
linda.text: I had the pleasure of working with Ty Savas Boas on a joint project. His positive attitude and entrepreneurial spirit were real assets to the team, consistently keeping motivation high. Tayfun was characterized by his openness to suggestions for improvement and often brought in fresh ideas. Ty has an eye for detail, and his experience in the branding and marketing industry has been a particular asset.

fabion.name: Fabion Latifi
fabion.text: It was a great pleasure to work with Ty Savas Boas AYA alias Taironman. His positive energy and motivational spirit significantly uplifted our team and contributed to our collective success. Tayfun has the innate ability to encourage team members to deliver their best work, consistently adding valuable insights during brainstorming sessions. His innovative thinking and proactive approach were instrumental in driving our projects forward. Furthermore, Tayfun is very detail-oriented and pays attention to the little things that others might overlook.

melissa.name: Melissa Lorenz
melissa.text: Ty has an extraordinary ability to maintain an overview and act with a goal-oriented approach. Even in crisis situations, he remains calm and solution-oriented. His professional approach and wisdom, especially at such a young age, have deeply impressed me. Tayfun also demonstrates a strong capacity for self-reflection and continuous improvement. I look forward to executing more projects with Tayfun in the future and am convinced that his skills and personality will enrich any team.

lyonel.name: Lyonel Berzen
lyonel.text: His tireless perseverance, especially in crisis situations, in which he remained calm, focused and solution-oriented, is remarkable. His ability to solve problems quickly and effectively was particularly impressive. He was also reliable at all times and always kept his word. Working on a project with Tayfun was a thoroughly positive experience.

amara.name: Amara Tessin
amara.text: Ty places great importance on effective communication, which fosters a collaborative and efficient working environment. Tayfun is disciplined and produces clean, reusable code that adheres to best practices. His design-oriented approach ensures that his solutions are both functional and aesthetically pleasing, enhancing the overall user experience. Tayfuns ability to work effectively and productively ensured that all projects were completed to the highest standard, making him an invaluable asset to any team.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy ‚Äì AYA, Inc.
privacy.description: This is the privacy policy of AYA, Inc. Here you will find all legal information and contact details in English.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Tayfun Savas Boas AYA
Freelancer in premium web development, branding and marketing.
Baarerstrasse 43
6300 Zug

Preamble

With the following privacy policy, we inform you which types of your personal data (hereinafter also referred to simply as ‚Äúdata‚Äù) we process, for which purposes and to what extent. The policy applies to all personal‚Äëdata processing we carry out ‚Äì in particular on our websites, in mobile apps and within external online presences such as our social‚Äëmedia profiles (collectively referred to as the ‚Äúonline offering‚Äù).

The terms used are gender‚Äëneutral.

Last updated: 18¬†April¬†2025

Table of contents

  • Preamble
  • Controller
  • Overview of processing operations
  • Relevant legal bases
  • Security measures
  • Transfer of personal data
  • International data transfers
  • General information on storage and deletion of data
  • Rights of the data subjects

Controller

Mr
Tayfun¬†Savas¬†Boas¬†AYA
Baarerstrasse¬†43
6300¬†Zug

Authorised representative: Mrs¬†Petra¬†AYA, Baarerstrasse¬†43,¬†6300¬†Zug

Email: mail@metafeller.com
Phone:¬†02196¬†‚Äì¬†888888

Overview of processing operations

The following overview summarises the categories of data processed, the purposes of processing and the categories of data subjects.

Categories of data processed

  • Master¬†data
  • Payment¬†data
  • Contact¬†data
  • Content¬†data
  • Contract¬†data
  • Usage¬†data
  • Meta‚Äë/communication/processing¬†data
  • Event¬†data (Facebook)
  • Log¬†data

Categories of data subjects

  • Service recipients & clients
  • Interested parties
  • Communication partners
  • Users
  • Business & contractual partners
  • Education & course participants

Purposes of processing

  • Provision of contractual services & fulfilment of contractual obligations
  • Communication
  • Security measures
  • Direct marketing
  • Reach/analytics
  • Tracking
  • Office & organisational procedures
  • Conversion measurement
  • Audience building
  • Organisational & administrative procedures
  • Feedback
  • Marketing
  • Profiles with user‚Äërelated information
  • Provision of our online offering & user‚Äëfriendliness
  • IT infrastructure
  • Public relations
  • Sales promotion
  • Business processes & commercial procedures

Relevant legal bases

Legal bases under the GDPR: The following provides an overview of the GDPR legal bases on which we process personal data. Please note that national data‚Äëprotection rules in your or our country of residence may also apply. Where more specific legal bases are relevant in individual cases, we will inform you in the privacy policy.

  • Consent (Art.‚ÄØ6‚ÄØ(1)‚ÄØlit.‚ÄØa‚ÄØGDPR) ‚Äì The data subject has given consent to the processing of their personal data for one or more specific purposes.
  • Contract performance and pre‚Äëcontractual enquiries (Art.‚ÄØ6‚ÄØ(1)‚ÄØlit.‚ÄØb‚ÄØGDPR) ‚Äì Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract with the data subject or in order to take steps at the request of the data subject prior to entering into a contract.
  • Legal obligation (Art.‚ÄØ6‚ÄØ(1)‚ÄØlit.‚ÄØc‚ÄØGDPR) ‚Äì Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject.
  • Legitimate interests (Art.‚ÄØ6‚ÄØ(1)‚ÄØlit.‚ÄØf‚ÄØGDPR) ‚Äì Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or a third party, except where such interests are overridden by the interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject.

National data‚Äëprotection legislation in Germany: In addition to the GDPR, the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG) applies. ‚Ä¶

Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection: Where you are located in Switzerland, we process your data on the basis of the Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection (FADP). ‚Ä¶
